snippet: A special session of lawmakers ended without a resolution to the problem of the state’s unfunded pension liability which, at more than $83 billion, is the worst in the country.
abstract: Illinois lawmakers fail to reach agreement on a pension package aimed at addressing the state's unfunded pension liability, which, at more than $83 billion, is the worst in the country.
lead_paragraph: A special session of lawmakers ended without a resolution to the problem of the state’s unfunded pension liability which, at more than $83 billion, is the worst in the country.

headline.main: Illinois Legislators Fail to Agree on Pension Package
headline.print_headline: Illinois Legislators Fail to Agree on Pension Package

keywords.value: American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees
